note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Depending on the country and year, inequality data relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Income inequality vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The [Gini coefficient](#dod:gini) measures inequality on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate higher inequality. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
